LanguageData.NukoHero.title: Young hero
LanguageData.NukoHero.baseDescription: [PAWN_possessive] tribe was destroyed during a pirate raid. [PAWN_nameDef] and [PAWN_possessive] packmates were captured. [PAWN_pronoun] managed to break free and release the rest. Together they killed the small crew and captured the ship which transported them.
LanguageData.NukoProtector.title: Grand protector
LanguageData.NukoProtector.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was the first Avali protector. On [PAWN_possessive] graduation day unknown entity attacked Earth. [PAWN_nameDef] lost all their pack but was able to escape from the Earth before it was annihilated. After some time [PAWN_pronoun] tracked down the monster and killed it, thereby saving the galaxy and avenging [PAWN_possessive] pack.\nDuring the exploration of ancient precursor civilization ruins [PAWN_objective] found some sort of transdimensional transportation device, activated it and found himself on this rimworld.
